name: unbind
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to release someone or something from a rope, string, etc. that has been tying him, her, or it up: My hands were unbound and my blindfold removed. Synonym
release (MAKE FREE)Opposite
bind (TIE/FASTEN)
